name: Guanbin Li
content: Guanbin Li (æå å½¬) Biography I am currently a full Professor in School of Computer Science and Engineering, Sun Yat-sen University. I received my PhD degree in computer science from the University of Hong Kong, advised by Prof. Yizhou Yu. I also hold a MS degree and a BE degree in computer science and technology from Sun Yat-sen University in 2009 and 2012 respectively. I have more than 150 publications in international conferences and journals, including TPAMI, TNNLS, TIP, CVPR, ICCV, ICML, AAAI and IJCAI, etc. My current research interests include computer vision, machine learning and medical image analysis. I am co-supervising the HCP-I2 Lab: Human-Cyber-Physical Intelligence Integration, SYSU. I am recruiting self-motivated Ph.D / Master students in computer vision and machine learning. If you are interested in, please directly send me your resume. papers are accepted by CVPR 2022, including one oral paper 2022-03: Three papers are accepted by ICME 2022 2022-01: Four papers are accepted by ISBI 2022, including two oral papers Research Interest Computer Vision Image Understanding, including saliency detection, multi-label image classification, visual captioning, visual question answering. Image Processing, including image super-resolution, color sketch generation, image inpainting. Other Applications, including visual tracking, person re-identification and crowd counting. Machine Learning Deep Learning, including deep CNN, LSTM, Attention Modeling, Generative Adversarial Network, Reinforcement Learning Classic Machine Learning Branches, including SVM, Random forest, Boosting, etc. Weakly supervised learning Academic Services I serve as an area chair of CVPR 2024. I serve as an associate editor of "The Visual Computer". I serve as an area chair of VISAPP2019. I serve as a program committee member of CVPR2017~2022, NeurlPS2020~2021, ECCV2020 && 2022, ICCV2019 && 2021, IJCAI2018~2022, AAAI2018~2022.
